parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The detachment or cracking of the windshield can cause obstructed vision, accidents, and injuries to the driver and passengers.
symptoms: The windshield detaches from the frame
migrates out of the frame at high speeds
and leaks water into the vehicle.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Defective Windshield Installation and Frame Design
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The defective installation and design of the windshield frame can cause the windshield to detach or crack, leading to accidents and injuries.
symptoms: The windshield is not properly secured to the frame
and the windshield migrates out of the frame.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Inadequate Repairs and Lack of Disclosure
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The inadequate repairs and lack of disclosure of the windshield detachment and cracking issues can lead to further accidents and injuries.
symptoms: and the problem is not disclosed to the consumer before purchase.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Window Frame Distortion due to Leveling System
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The distortion of the front window frames can cause water leaks, air leaks, and reduced structural integrity, potentially leading to safety issues and damage to the vehicle's interior.
symptoms: The tops of the front windows bulge away from the body when the RV is leveled using the jacking system
creating a gap between the window frame and the body.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the power steering system can cause a loss of steering ability, leading to a significant safety hazard, especially when driving at high speeds or in heavy traffic.
The failure of the brake system can cause a loss of braking ability, leading to a significant safety hazard, especially when driving at high speeds or in heavy traffic.
symptoms: brake pedal goes to the floor
